name: Snake Marble Shooting
description:
SNAKE IS PLAYING WITH COLORFUL BALLS!
A snake finds lots of colorful balls in a rotating plate,and those magic balls can get vanish in the blink of an eye if you connect three or more of them together. But the snake needs your help to fulfil this.
Your goal is to shoot all the balls. Score as many as you can. You can shoot balls by forming group of three or more similar collar balls. Simply tap to shoot.
